title: eppaDip-pADinarO
sahitya:
eppaDip-pAdinarO tiruvaDiyAr appaDip-pADa nAn Ashai koNDEn shivanE


anupallavi

  apparum sundaraum ALUDaip-piLLaiyum aruL maNI vAcakarum poruLuNarnDu unnaiyE


caraNam    gurumaNI shankaraum arumait-tAyumAnArum aruNagirinAtharum arutjyOti vaLLalum
karuNaikkaDal perugi kAdalinAl urugi kanittamizhccollinAl indunai anudinam
